description:
When Kyousuke comes home from school and opens his door, he finds a young, naked girl who just got out of the bath. Kyousuke is completely shocked, but the young girl is Ria, Kirino`s roommate from when she studied abroad. She`s staying with the Kousaka family while she`s in Japan, but the innocent young girl asks Kirino and Kyousuke to take her sightseeing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La rivale de ma petite sœur n`est pas censée venir au Japon
My Little Sister`s Rival Can`t Come to Japan
Ore no Imouto no Rival ga Rainichi Suru Wake ga Nai
俺の妹のライバルが来日するわけがない
